title: The Patrol method
creator_credit: Boy Scouts of America. Visual Education Service
brief_description: This film is designed primarily for training of scout leaders in principles and methods of scouting, with the patrol as the basic unit. it is recommended that the Scout Leader see the film several times during the period of a year, so that he has an opportunity to apply what he learns about the technique of Patrol method, and then go back to restudy the film in light of his own methods.
